text: The Eresus or Ladybird spider is a type of velvet spider with spots on its back resembling a ladybug. ==Species== * Eresus kollari Rossi, 1846 — Europe to Central Asia * Eresus moravicus Řezáč, 2008 — Austria, Hungary, Czech Republic, Slovakia * Eresus robustus Franganillo, 1918 — Spain * Eresus rotundiceps Simon, 1873 — Ukraine, Turkmenistan * Eresus ruficapillus C. L. Koch, 1846 — Sicily, Croatia * Eresus sandaliatus (Martini & Goeze, 1778) — Northern Europe * Eresus walckenaeri Brullé, 1832 — Mediterranean Category:Araneomorphae
title: Eresus
